body:
Hi everybody,

I have two questions:

1. I want to determine a shading for my room. But I don’t know how to assign shading to my room. Please guide me.

2. When I run this file, I see this error. How can I solve it?

Best Regards

Sajjad.

[ ](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3Wsv3wQeZCDvxDEjtMT6VhhVADjQJFnEwVJLvFRtcRp9eJ3*oBusF37fsqaA4zuKzGtRvciVLPqyWh*KI1hDM8oGHE8YXgBH/project.gh)

replies.body: You can either add shadings as context geometries or add blinds to windows. You can find examples for both cases on Hydra. [1](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=EnergyPlus_Window_Shade_Generator&slide=1&scale=1&offset=0,0), [2](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=Quantify_HVAC_Sizing_Impact_of_Shade&slide=0&scale=2.713208654895344&offset=-680.5853009129562,-572.0154710863253).
